comments: Contribution from _Tito Piezas III_, Dec 28 2008: (Start)Being a subset of A141158, this is also a subset of the primes of form x^2-5y^2.(End)
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(1300) | p mod 5 in {0, 1} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 13 2012
crossrefs: Same as A030430 with addition of primes congruent to 0 mod 5, i.e. 5.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
